mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.submit_name AS "submitName", a.version AS "version", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.status_code AS "statusCode", a.last_update_time AS "lastUpdateTime", a.user_id AS "userid", a.score AS "score", a.result_content AS "resultContent", a.bos_key AS "bosKey", a.bos_file_url AS "bosFileUrl", a.start_time AS "startTime", a.end_time AS "endTime", a.process_id AS "processId", a.anonymous AS "anonymous", a.reference AS "reference", a.introduction AS "introduction", a.project_id AS "projectId", a.match_id AS "matchId", a.error_msg AS "errorMsg", p.user_name AS "userName"
LEFT JOIN ps_user p ON p.id = a.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ps_match_submit( submit_name, version, create_time, status_code, last_update_time, user_id, score, result_content, bos_key, bos_file_url, start_time, end_time, process_id, anonymous, reference, introduction, project_id, match_id, error_msg ) VALUES ( #{submitName}, #{version}, #{createTime}, #{statusCode}, #{lastUpdateTime}, #{userid}, #{score}, #{resultContent}, #{bosKey}, #{bosFileUrl}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{processId}, #{anonymous}, #{reference}, #{introduction}, #{projectId}, #{matchId}, #{errorMsg} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ps_match_submit SET submit_name = #{submitName}, version = #{version}, create_time = #{createTime}, status_code = #{statusCode}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime}, user_id = #{userid}, score = #{score}, result_content = #{resultContent}, bos_key = #{bosKey}, bos_file_url = #{bosFileUrl}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, process_id = #{processId}, anonymous = #{anonymous}, reference = #{reference}, introduction = #{introduction}, project_id = #{projectId}, match_id = #{matchId}, error_msg = #{errorMsg} WHERE id = #{id}
